summary: The BAH Restoration Act (H.R. 1956) aims to amend Title 37 of the United States Code to increase the Basic Allowance for Housing (BAH) for members of the uniformed services within the United States. The bill mandates that the BAH amount for a specific area be equivalent to the monthly cost of adequate housing in that area, as determined by the Secretary of Defense, for service members of the same pay grade and dependency status.
